wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor

Class EditorComponent.RenderedController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
      • wissim.controller.filters.gui.editor.EditorComponent.RenderedController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.awt.event.MouseWheelListener, java.util.EventListener, EditorComponent.Controller
    Enclosing class:
    EditorComponent

    private class EditorComponent.RenderedController
extends java.awt.event.MouseAdapter
implements EditorComponent.Controller
    Controller interface to handle editors with content rendered.
